thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 03 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Tuesday

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Tuesday
text:
The following Spanish stocks may be affected by newspaper reports and other factors on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified the newspaper reports, and cannot vouch for their accuracy:
FERROVIAL RBC raises to “outperform” from “sector perform”.
DEOLEO Deoleo said on Monday it entered into a strategic partnership with Vinaoliva Cooperative from Extramadura region in Spain.
TREASURY Spain will sell between 4 billion and 5 billion euros of 6- and 12-month T-bills on Tuesday.
